pr_title: Allow java interop with object functions

timeline.message: Add support for object interop functions
Add testcase for object interop functions
Add testcase for object interop functions
Add more tests to object interop methods
Remove invalid old object native tests
Merge master branch and fix conflicts

timeline.author: Kishanthan
